RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Dac Chartrand, Marvin Tjon, Bjorn Nesby, reaby
RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Midi Convert
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Converts a Renoise song into a MIDI file. Notes are grouped by instrument and exported per track. Creates "Export Song to MIDI..." in the File menu, "Selection:Export to MIDI..." in the Pattern Editor menu, and an "Export Selection to MIDI" keybinding.
